content: For release on delivery  8:25 p.m. EDT, May 30, 2010 (9:25 a.m. local time, May 31, 2010)    The Policy Response to the Crisis in Korea and Other Emerging Market Economies         Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Bank of Korea’s International Conference     Seoul, Korea  (via video recording)    May 31, 2010
